participant_1.background:
I don't talk about my parents.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I'm a hard worker with a sweet tooth.
I don't play for anyone, but I love huge paintings and my favorite food is salad.
i work for a clothes retailer.

participant_2.background:
I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise.
i have a personal trainer.
I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.
I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I enjoy reading and hiking in the mountains.
I love to read too! Have you read any good books lately?
I just finished reading "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen. It was really good!
I've heard good things about that book, but I haven't read it yet. I'm not sure if I'm ready to read a book that's that long.
It's not as long as it seems! It's a really quick read.
I'll have to check it out then. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to travel, teach, and go shopping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to travel, but I don't have the money.
It can be expensive, but it's worth it! You can save up and go on a trip once a year or so.
I'll have to do that! Thanks for the advice!
No problem! It's always nice to talk to someone who likes to travel.
Me too! It's nice to meet you!
